text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Annuity contract" means a fixed or variable annuity contract or combination of fixed or variable annuity contracts authorized under § 403(a) or (b) of the Internal Revenue Code.
"Annuity contract" includes a custodial account to be invested in regulated investment company stock as provided in § 401(f) or § 403(b)(7) of the Internal Revenue Code.

text.section:
"Designated company" means an entity that:
on or before March 1, 1993, was designated by the governing board of an employing institution to offer annuity contracts under the program; or
is designated by the Board of Trustees.
"Eligible employee" means an individual eligible to participate in the program.
"Participating employee" means an eligible employee who elects to participate in the program.
"Pension system" means the Employees' Pension System or the Teachers' Pension System.
"Program" means the optional retirement program established under § 30-201 of this title.
"Retirement system" means the Employees' Retirement System or the Teachers' Retirement System.
"Supplemental retirement plans" means plans established pursuant to § 30-401 of this title.
